attributes.action: Push confectionery bosses for sugar free sweets and chocolate save our children
attributes.background: Diabetes/diseases obesity is massively increasing in the uk more children and adults are being diagnosed with diabetes/obesity costing The NHS millions. These big confectionery bosses still have the cheek to not use the the nutritional colour coded labels to show public what's high and low of produc

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking the Government to urge confectionery companies to produce more sugar-free products. You could also start a new petition calling for colour-coded nutritional labels to be required by law.
